1st_Number: block type - 1 = square block, 2 = equilateral triangle, 3 = right triangle
2nd_Number: strength (starting color of block) - 1 = strongest block, 4 = middle strength, and 6 = weakest block
3rd_Number: direction (for triangle blocks) - 1 = up/top left, 2 = down/top right, 3 = bottom left, 4 = bottom right
